statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: La Salle 70, MD Baltimore Co 55
article.story: CATONSVILLE, Md. (AP) -- Jermaine Thomas scored 17 points and Steven Smith had 15 points and nine rebounds, lifting La Salle to a 70-55 victory over Maryland-Baltimore County on Sunday night. Darnell Harris added 13 points for the Explorers (1-0). UMBC (1-1) got 17 points from Brian Hodges and 10 from John Zito. Smith, last year's Atlantic 10 co-Player of the Year, was limited to seven first-half points as the Retrievers employed a rotation of undersized defenders to disrupt him. But Smith came alive early in the second half, following a scoreless drought of more than eight minutes during which the Retrievers scored 12 points and grabbed the lead. Mike Housman's lay-in following a loose-ball scramble capped the UMBC run, providing a 37-35 advantage with 15:51 remaining in the game. A jumper by Harris tied it, and Thomas and Harris each hit a pair of free throws for a 41-37 La Salle cushion. After Zito tipped in Housman's miss to get UMBC within two, Smith converted a jump-hook, starting a 12-1 run that sealed the victory. Smith later scored on a strong inside move for a 47-41 lead with 10:19 left in the game. After a 3 by Harris put La Salle up 52-42 with 7:29 left, the Explorers failed to score from the field again. But the Explorers closed the game by hitting 18 of 22 free throws, finishing 29-of-38 for the game. La Salle closed the first half on a 16-10 run for a 35-29 halftime lead. Housman's tip-in got UMBC within 23-31 with 8:26 left in the half, but the Retrievers didn't hit another shot from the field for more than four minutes. Smith hit a baseline jumper and then converted a steal into a slam dunk before a left-side 3-pointer by Thomas put the Explorers up 30-21.
